title: Classic Everest
brief_description: Looks at a group of ordinary people as they travel part way up Mount Everest. the group is led by tashi tensing, grandson of the famous sherpa who accompanied Hilary on the first successful climb of Everest. Also includes rare footage of the bones claimed to be from the famous Yeti, along with the Mani Rhindu festival at the Tenboche Monastry.
